Conditions.title: Terms of Use
Conditions.description: Review the general terms of use for the KHDEMNA platform.

section1.title: 1. Introduction and Scope
section1.description1: KHDEMNA is an Algerian platform facilitating connections between individuals for home service provisions. Users can post service requests or offer their skills as providers. These general terms govern the use of the platform by all registered users, whether clients or providers.
section1.description2: KHDEMNA is a registered trademark, operated by a company registered in Algeria. (Address to be added).

definitions.title: 2.1 Definitions
definitions.platform: KHDEMNA / Platform: an online service available via the website (URL to be inserted) and its mobile applications on iOS and Android.
definitions.client: Client: a user seeking a provider to perform a service.
definitions.provider: Provider: a user offering their services to clients.
definitions.service: Service: any service published or offered via KHDEMNA.
definitions.member: Member: any individual with an active client or provider account on the platform.

role.title: 2.2 Role of KHDEMNA
role.description: KHDEMNA acts as an intermediary between parties. It facilitates the posting of advertisements and the search for providers but does not intervene in the execution of services or the resulting contractual relationship.

nonAssumedRoles.title: 2.3 Roles Not Assumed by KHDEMNA
nonAssumedRoles.description: KHDEMNA does not play any role other than providing a platform for advertisements and connecting parties, and as such:
nonAssumedRoles.item1: is neither an employer, recruiter, nor placement agency.
nonAssumedRoles.item3: exercises no authority over clients or providers.
nonAssumedRoles.item4: is not mandated by providers to seek third parties requesting services.
nonAssumedRoles.item5: is not a party to any contract that may be formed between a client and a provider.
nonAssumedRoles.item6: does not intervene at any point in the performance of services between clients and providers, which are beyond the scope of the platform‚Äôs responsibilities.

clientResponsibilities.title: 2.4 Client Responsibilities
clientResponsibilities.item1: Clients must provide accurate and detailed information.
clientResponsibilities.item2: They are solely responsible for their requests.
clientResponsibilities.item3: They must make the appropriate legal declarations if required by their relationship with a provider.
clientResponsibilities.item4: The estimated duration of a service is provided for guidance only. The client remains the decision-maker.

providerCommitments.title: 2.5 Provider Commitments
providerCommitments.item1: They must be legally authorized to practice in their country.
providerCommitments.item2: They commit to fulfilling their obligations and providing quality service.

ineligibleServices.title: 2.6.1 Ineligible Services
ineligibleServices.description1: KHDEMNA is a platform for home services. The list of services available on the platform may change at any time based on local regulations and the ability of members to offer the service.
ineligibleServices.description2: However, without being exhaustive, the following activities are not permitted on the platform:
ineligibleServices.item1: Any construction/renovation activities requiring mandatory insurance, affecting the structural integrity of a building, or rendering it unfit for its purpose.
ineligibleServices.item2: Activities and tasks subject to mandatory insurance or regulated professions.
ineligibleServices.item3: Activities in the financial, political, pharmaceutical, medical, industrial engineering, construction, mechanical, aerospace, nuclear, or defense sectors.
ineligibleServices.item4: Financial consulting, financial communication, wealth management, investment, or general financial engineering activities.

providerCompetencies.title: 2.6.2 Provider Competencies
providerCompetencies.item1: KHDEMNA allows providers to present their skills and equipment. KHDEMNA does not validate this data. Providers are solely responsible for offering services they are capable of performing, under the pricing conditions defined during booking.
providerCompetencies.item2: The platform is a community space and publicly shares qualitative data about services performed, based on information provided by clients. This information is provided for informational purposes without KHDEMNA being able to verify it.
providerCompetencies.item3: KHDEMNA is not responsible for the proper execution of the service but will make every effort to assist members within the scope of its responsibilities.

eligibility.title: 3.1 Eligibility
eligibility.description1: Only individuals who are of legal age according to the legislation in the country where the service is performed and who have full legal capacity may register on the site.
eligibility.description2: KHDEMNA reserves the right to refuse registration to any individual who does not comply with these General Terms or applicable legislation.

registrationMethod.title: 3.2 Registration Method
registrationMethod.description: To post a job advertisement or a provider profile, any user must register on the site to become a member. They can do so by:
registrationMethod.item1: visiting the site, clicking on the 'Registration' tab, and filling in the mandatory fields in the registration form (username, password, postal code, valid email address, etc.). Once these fields are completed, the user must validate their registration by clicking the 'Register' button and accepting the site‚Äôs General Terms.
registrationMethod.item2: Providers must have their account creation validated by the company‚Äôs representatives at the local office.

validity.title: 3.3 Validity
validity.description: By validating their registration, the user acknowledges having provided accurate and up-to-date personal information in the registration form. If required information changes over time, the member undertakes to update their profile promptly.

section4.title: 4. Services and Financial Conditions for Clients

servicePricing.title: 4.1 Service Pricing
servicePricing.description: The price offered by the application is determined based on data from our dashboard. Prices are indexed according to the type of service and the duration of the service. These prices may change over time.

platformFees.title: 4.2 Platform Service Fees
platformFees.description: Posting a job advertisement on the platform is free; however, service fees apply to the provider once the service is validated. The service fee amount is equal to 20% of the provider‚Äôs compensation.

cashPayments.title: 4.3.1 Cash Payments
cashPayments.description: The client is required to pay the provider at the end of the service. The provider, in turn, must pay a commission to the platform after each completed service.

proofOfPayment.title: 4.3.2 Proof of Payment
proofOfPayment.description: Proof of the financial transaction is based on data recorded by the organization. Members are encouraged to keep the electronic receipt recorded in their account for personal needs. Service fee billing or certificates will be produced digitally; there will be no paper documents. All these elements, depending on the user‚Äôs activity, will be accessible on the platform.

section5.title: 5. KHDEMNA Insurance
section5.description: KHDEMNA cannot be held liable for damages caused during services. Depending on the situation, it is up to the client or provider to activate their appropriate insurance.

exclusion.title: 5.1 Exclusion
exclusion.description: Theft, loss, or disappearance of entrusted property are cases that cannot be addressed by KHDEMNA. A judicial procedure must be initiated with the competent authorities.

section6.title: 6. Cancellation Policy
section6.item1: The client and the provider may cancel the booking at any time before the service is performed without any financial obligation to each other.
section6.item2: In case of cancellation by the provider, the client may select a new provider for the same task without additional fees.

section7.title: 7. Services and Financial Conditions for Providers
section7.item1: KHDEMNA provides providers with a dedicated mobile application, 'KHDEMNA Jobber,' allowing them to manage their profile, configure and automate their offers, synchronize their schedules, and improve their visibility score.
section7.item2: Access to the application and its use do not require a subscription or prepayment.
section7.item3: In return, the platform charges a commission on the income received directly through it.

violation.title: 8.1 Violation of General Terms
violation.description: Any violation of these General Terms by a member may lead to their exclusion from the site.

otherReasons.title: 8.2 Other Reasons for Exclusion
otherReasons.description: In general, members undertake not to use the site for purposes that are:
otherReasons.item1: insulting, defamatory, contrary to public order, or good morals;
otherReasons.item2: infringing on the privacy of third parties;
otherReasons.item3: directly promotional or constituting prohibited advertising under applicable laws;
otherReasons.item5: intended to circumvent applicable social and tax rules regarding job requests or offers;
otherReasons.item7: constituting disparagement of a company or its products, parasitism, unfair competition, or counterfeiting;
otherReasons.item8: disrupting the operation of the site;
otherReasons.item9: or more broadly, violating any law or regulation in force.

consequences.title: 8.3 Consequences of Exclusion
consequences.description: In case of a member‚Äôs exclusion, KHDEMNA shall not be held liable, and all their job advertisements and/or provider profile will be deleted.

accountDeletion.title: 8.4 Account Deletion by a Member
accountDeletion.item1: Any member may close their account at any time, subject to fulfilling obligations incurred prior to closure (service performance, payment of fees, transactions between a client and a provider, etc.).
accountDeletion.item2: Upon account deletion, a message will alert the user regarding any ongoing transactions.
accountDeletion.item3: A deleted account cannot be recovered.

inactivity.title: 8.5 Inactivity
inactivity.description: In case of member inactivity for 365 consecutive days, the account will be considered abandoned and consequently deactivated. After this period, the account will be considered abandoned and deleted according to the same rules defined in the previous paragraph.

backgroundCheck.title: 9.1 Provider Background Checks
backgroundCheck.description: To ensure safety and trust within the KHDEMNA community, each provider may be subject to a background check procedure before or during their use of the platform. Within the limits of applicable local laws, this procedure may include the following:
backgroundCheck.item1: Identity Verification: KHDEMNA reserves the right to verify the provider‚Äôs identity using official identification documents provided by the provider.
backgroundCheck.item2: Criminal Background Check: To the extent permitted by law, KHDEMNA may use specialized third-party services to verify that the provider has no relevant criminal convictions that could compromise user safety.
backgroundCheck.item3: Professional Qualifications and Licenses: Providers must provide the necessary licenses, permits, or certifications for the services offered via KHDEMNA, in accordance with local laws. KHDEMNA does not systematically verify these documents but may request their submission as part of the background check.

providerConsent.title: 9.2 Provider Consent
providerConsent.description: By registering on KHDEMNA, the provider consents to this background check and agrees that their data may be shared with KHDEMNA‚Äôs verification partners solely for the purpose of conducting this check. Information collected during this procedure will be processed in accordance with KHDEMNA‚Äôs Privacy Policy.

liabilityLimitation.title: 9.3 Limitation of Liability
liabilityLimitation.description: KHDEMNA strives to provide a secure environment by conducting checks but does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information obtained during the background check. KHDEMNA disclaims any liability for misrepresentations or errors in the information provided by the provider or third-party services.

section10.title: 10. Personal Data Protection
section10.description1: In accordance with data protection laws, KHDEMNA is committed to protecting users‚Äô personal data. This data is collected and processed solely for the purpose of using the platform.
section10.item1: Data Management: KHDEMNA does not share personal data with third parties without the explicit consent of users.
section10.item2: Access and Rectification Rights: In accordance with the law, users may access their personal data, modify it, or request its deletion by contacting KHDEMNA at [EMAIL ADDRESS TO BE ADDED].
section10.description2: For more details, please review our Privacy Policy.

khdemnaIP.title: 11.1 KHDEMNA Intellectual Property
khdemnaIP.description: KHDEMNA holds the intellectual property rights to the site as a platform for member advertisements (site architecture, feature organization, ergonomics, software functionalities, etc.). Any reproduction of the site‚Äôs constituent elements without KHDEMNA‚Äôs prior written authorization may constitute infringement and result in civil and/or criminal liability for the perpetrator.

externalIP.title: 11.2 Use of External Intellectual Property on the Site
externalIP.description1: Members undertake not to publish on the site any element (text, photograph, image, logo, or any other creation or sign subject to intellectual property rights) without the prior written consent of the rights holder.
externalIP.description2: As needed, members grant KHDEMNA a license to use the intellectual property rights attached to content they may insert on the site. This worldwide license, for the duration of the rights in question, includes KHDEMNA‚Äôs right to reproduce, represent, or adapt said content to ensure optimal presentation on the site (notably with regard to its graphic charter and technical performance).

contentLicense.title: 11.3 License for Use of Content by KHDEMNA
contentLicense.description1: Members (clients and providers) acknowledge and agree that any photograph, image, or visual content they publish on the KHDEMNA platform as part of a service advertisement or review may be used by KHDEMNA for promotional and communication purposes.
contentLicense.description2: To this end, members grant KHDEMNA a worldwide, free, non-exclusive, and transferable license to reproduce, represent, modify, adapt, and distribute this content on all KHDEMNA-related communication media, including but not limited to:
contentLicense.item1: The KHDEMNA website and mobile applications,
contentLicense.item2: KHDEMNA‚Äôs social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.),
contentLicense.description3: This license is granted for the entire duration of the intellectual property rights associated with said content, unless a written request for withdrawal is made by the member to [ADDRESS TO BE ADDED]. In such cases, KHDEMNA undertakes to remove the content concerned within a reasonable period, subject to technical constraints and ongoing campaigns.

Faq.title: We Have 24/7 Support Available

booking.question: How do I book a service provider?
booking.answer: Simply search for the service you need, browse through the list of available providers, check their profiles and reviews, and then book them directly through our platform.

payment.question: What are the payment options?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and direct bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our platform.

safety.question: Is it safe to let providers into my home?
safety.answer: Yes, absolutely. All providers on our platform undergo a rigorous background check and are verified for their qualifications and experience. Your safety is our top priority.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
satisfaction.answer: We have a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the service provided, please contact our support team within 24 hours, and we will work to resolve the issue or provide a refund.
